content.name: [ТРЕБУЕТ ПЕРЕВОД] Better Target Monitor
content.description:
[ТРЕБУЕТ ПЕРЕВОД] Improves the target monitor, with more info and legibility.
May be customized through the extension options menu.
content.author: SirNukes

language.description: Мод улучшает информативность монитора цели предоставляя больше информации.
Improves the target monitor, with more info and legibility.
